name: Arm & A Leg
description:
A game created for Ludum Dare Game Jam 44

You play as a robot that was discarded by their owner and are lost in a dark ravine.  Surrounded by scavenger bots, you need to sell your own parts to arm yourself and make your way back to the surface! Controls:

A/D | Left/Right Arrow Keys: Move 

Space Bar: Jump 

Left Click: Proceed through dialog / Shoot / Buy Items 

Right Click: Sell Items 

Esc:  Restart Game

Song Credit: http://computoser.com/track/2589
